name: Dermond Construction
tags: offensive, defensive, engines, no_drop, no_salvage, special
desc: Standard Dermond construction Mechanic. It does a lot to the normal hull, the special feature of this type of construction is the integrated triple flux core, which evenly distributes and efficiently disappointing flux.

name: Fertilla Flux Mechanic
desc: Overrides Flux core safety protocols increasing it's flux dissipation and maximum flux barrier depending on the hull size.

name: Ornium Engine Modification
desc: text test

name: Torharta Hangar modification
desc: So normally you would need X amount to refit and rearm a fighter, well now you have more crew to do so!

name: Reconstructed Ship
desc: This ship was stripped and rebuild almost completely, everything what was left from the old ship is the hull.

name: Altorno Ships Modification
desc: For some unknown reasons Dermond found a way to put their ships into permanent Damper Field emitting mode with HUGE modifications, this has caused the ship to take very little to no damage at all. This hullmod is the newest in Dermondian Federal Navy and was adopted in cycle 205.

name: Celtorian System
desc: Phase system developed by Dermond during cycle 204, after Commander Pralne took his first fly in Dermond constructed Excelsior Dermond Modification Superfrigate he suggested some modifications for the ship to become more effective, unluckily during the 5th test he went missing, nobody knows where he is currently...

name: Dermond Targeting Unit
desc: Dermondian Targeting Unit is based on 3 Gamma Cores fused together, nobody knows how they did it, but they did it. Due to some problems with Gamma Cores being fused into one, ships maintenance is increased.

name: FUN
desc:
#DATA DAMAGED
Oh wait wrong script
So you are either lucky, or I coded it wrongly. This hullmod pretty much triples your damage. If you want S mod it, I don't care. If Mod Mafia deems this mod bad, FUCK YOU!

name: 5th Gen FTL combat modification
desc: This experimental hullmod was developed before The Collapse and not so many were smuggeled into the Persean Sector. Not a lot of Factions use it however and can not replicate, it looks like somebody is working to not let this hullmod be widely adopted. The reason is still unknown.

name: Persean HitnRun modification
desc: Was developed in Persean Sector after XIV's arrival to the sector, it is primarily used by Persean League and Tri Tachyon, however due to peace treaty after 2nd AI war the hullmod was banned from usage, however some factions and independent pilots do not care.

name: TT Experimental Shields
desc: Newest Tri Tachyon made Experimental Shields hullmod. This hullmod overrides default shield safety protocols, and enhances the default shield, however it was not widely used during the 2nd AI War due to an unknown reasons because Tri Tachyon had Logistical Capabilities to use this Hullmod.

name: 77th Battlegroup Maintenence hullmod
desc:
Experimental technologies were a widely tested subject in Domain. Thus the creation of 77th battlegroup was foreseen by many in the time. These brave man and woman of the domain tested the technologies that will ultimately either vanish after the collapse or get into twisted version of their former selves. 77th did not get the recognitions it deserved yet their existence is still important to several Battlegroups and their beloved generals who use the lost technologies for their lost fleets.
Bkz. 36th, 95th, 573th and 26th

name: Traveler
desc: This hullmod was developed by an unknown explorer, after he figured out that he can make legally his own ships work diffirent he stripped them apart and rebuilt them. The result of his work was this hullmod, however the captain who made this hullmod doesn't exist?

name: FUCK IT WE BALL
desc: FUCK IT WE BALL FUCK IT WE BALL FUCK IT WE BALL FUCK IT WE BALL FUCK IT WE BALL FUCK IT WE BALL FUCK IT WE BALL FUCK IT WE BALL FUCK IT WE BALL FUCK IT WE BALL
short: Ballin tier: FUCK IT WE BALL

name: Excelsior my beloved
desc: Captain your ship takes 200x times more damage, but we Ballin Inc. have you covered!
short: Ballin tier: My balls are very heavy, heavier that they are the black hole

name: Ballin
desc: Captain I think you don't need any explanations, here is the hullmod now go and kill those rebels!

name: I have some bits of skill
desc: Greetings captain! This hullmod was made for mid tier tr-. Sorry for mid tier captains just like you! We hope at Ballin Inc. you will solve your skill issue

name: I would like to get hit more?
desc: Greetings new customer! You are that type of person who we Ballin Inc. call "new customers" so I hope you will have fun!

name: Hit me more dady :>
desc: So you want to get some bonuses but you're a pussy? Well we have you covered at Ballin Inc. We have created specially for you this hullmod. Now go and cry!

name: #nope
desc:
This Hullmod allows the Intergration of Hunter AI core to your ship.
But be aware, somebody might kill you if they will find out you were using Hunter AI...

name: #nope

name: Incompatible Hullmod Added
desc: You have tried to add a hullmod which is incompatible with the ship's already installed/built-in hullmod
